constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 161 (Friday, September 17, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DAVID SCOTT of Georgia:
H.R. 5290.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
U.S. Const. art. I, Sec. 8, cl. 3 and cl. 18.
[Page H4531]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

title: To extend authorization for livestock mandatory reporting.
